mapper.sql: a.xh AS "xh", a.cd_idm AS "cdIdm", a.ksdm AS "ksdm", a.ph AS "ph", a.ypjj AS "ypjj", a.pcsl AS "pcsl", a.kcsl AS "kcsl", a.rkrq AS "rkrq", a.sxrq AS "sxrq", a.jlzt AS "jlzt", a.memo AS "memo", a.djsl AS "djsl", a.jxje AS "jxje", a.scrq AS "scrq", a.kzbz AS "kzbz", a.ylsj AS "ylsj", a.ghdwdm AS "ghdwdm", a.ghdwmc AS "ghdwmc", a.isxtzdsc AS "isxtzdsc", a.del_flag AS "delFlag", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.remarks AS "remarks", a.create_date AS "createDate"
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO medsto_yppck( xh, cd_idm, ksdm, ph, ypjj, pcsl, kcsl, rkrq, sxrq, jlzt, memo, djsl, jxje, scrq, kzbz, ylsj, ghdwdm, ghdwmc, isxtzdsc, del_flag, create_by, update_date, update_by, remarks, create_date ) VALUES ( #{xh}, #{cdIdm}, #{ksdm}, #{ph}, #{ypjj}, #{pcsl}, #{kcsl}, #{rkrq}, #{sxrq}, #{jlzt}, #{memo}, #{djsl}, #{jxje}, #{scrq}, #{kzbz}, #{ylsj}, #{ghdwdm}, #{ghdwmc}, #{isxtzdsc}, #{delFlag}, #{createBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{remarks}, #{createDate} )

INSERT INTO medsto_yppck( xh, cd_idm, ksdm, ph, ypjj, pcsl, kcsl, rkrq, sxrq, jlzt, memo, djsl, jxje, scrq, kzbz, ylsj, ghdwdm, ghdwmc, isxtzdsc, del_flag, create_by, update_date, update_by, remarks, create_date ) VALUES
( #{item.xh}, #{item.cdIdm}, #{item.ksdm}, #{item.ph}, #{item.ypjj}, #{item.pcsl}, #{item.kcsl}, #{item.rkrq}, #{item.sxrq}, #{item.jlzt}, #{item.memo}, #{item.djsl}, #{item.jxje}, #{item.scrq}, #{item.kzbz}, #{item.ylsj}, #{item.ghdwdm}, #{item.ghdwmc}, #{item.isxtzdsc}, #{item.delFlag}, #{item.createBy.id}, #{item.updateDate}, #{item.updateBy.id}, #{item.remarks}, #{item.createDate} )
mapper.update: UPDATE medsto_yppck SET xh = #{xh}, cd_idm = #{cdIdm}, ksdm = #{ksdm}, ph = #{ph}, ypjj = #{ypjj}, pcsl = #{pcsl}, kcsl = #{kcsl}, rkrq = #{rkrq}, sxrq = #{sxrq}, jlzt = #{jlzt}, memo = #{memo}, djsl = #{djsl}, jxje = #{jxje}, scrq = #{scrq}, kzbz = #{kzbz}, ylsj = #{ylsj}, ghdwdm = #{ghdwdm}, ghdwmc = #{ghdwmc}, isxtzdsc = #{isxtzdsc}, update_date = #{updateDate}, update_by = #{updateBy.id}, remarks = #{remarks} WHERE id = #{id}
